About Us

About us

Chief chips started as an idea when the founder’s whipped a snack for her son, whose comment was: “Mom this is so good you should sell these!”. The snack that he was referring to was home made kettle fried cassava chips. The idea took root (quite literally) and began a long journey to develop and create a product that her initial critic, her son, would be proud of. Following in the footsteps of her Grand father, a prominent chief in Sango Ota, she named the product Chief Chips in his honour.

The driving force of this product hence is inspired by 3 generations, her Grand father the Chief, who believed in industrialisation  and job creation, herself and her skills to bring a product to market, and her son that sets the benchmark that inspires us everyday. A large sign in the office hangs that reads “ Make a product with the love an attention you would, if you knew the person eating it was your own child” that’s at the heart of the product we put out.

Mission statement

Our mission is to offer our customers the best option for a snack that’s filling and free of additives and preservatives at the best possible value.

Vision statement

To have our brand as the most visible snack option in all retail outlets across the country
